data.name: Survive The Dark
data.detailed_description:
Survive The Dark


Survive The Dark is a story-driven, physics-based first person simulator in a post-apocalyptic mountain overrun by zombies.
Clinging to life, you find yourself in the mountain full of zombies.
You are left alone without any food or equipment, trying to survive the dark until the rescue team arrives.
Your goal is to survive in the depths of a nightmarish environment using truly intuitive means to escape.
You’ll have to learn actual survival techniques to build shelters, make tools, and craft weapons in order to hunt and defend yourself.
Build, explore and SURVIVE THE DARK!

Key Features

  • Chop down trees to build a camp, or start a fire to keep warm.
  • Craft weapons and tools to hunt and defend yourself.
  • Explore and build during the day. Defend your base at night.
  • Scavenge food to keep yourself from starving.

Supports

Full bHaptics support including Tactsuit, Tactosy for arms, Tactal for head.

Clinging to life, you find yourself in the mountain full of zombies. Your goal is to survive in the depths of a nightmarish environment using truly intuitive means to escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.81 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.81 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: It includes brutal elements such as cutting off zombies body using a knife and stabbing weapons in the body.
